## InternalServerErrorService.showInternalServerError() method

Displays internal server error as dialog

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
showInternalServerError(errorHtml: string, requestUrl: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errorHtml | string | Html that will be displayed in dialog |
|  requestUrl | string | Url of request that ended with internal server error |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
